title: aLavEdu eDuttu
sahitya:
aLavEdu eDuttu.  rAgA:  pUrNacandrikA.  khaNDacApu tALA.
ALavEdu eDutturaikka shol vaLamEdu vaLLalE undan kalyANa guNattirkkOr


anupallavi

  akhilam mayanga ezhil mighum aNangAgi amarar kuzhAm uyya amudaLitta un aruLuk-


caraNam    dEvar tuyar tIrattAvi ulagaLandAi mEvi marai mITka mInAi kaDal pughundAi aivarkkAghat-tUdAi
 anru naDandu shenrAi parandu karikAttu maraindi tughil aLittu bAlan shol kAttiDap-pAr nirainda karuNaik-
